title: A Safe Place for Girls to Grow up As Women
itunes:author: Guest: Patti Garibay
itunes:summary:
Patti Garibay describes how American Heritage Girls (AHG) was founded in response to the Girl Scout's decision to step away from their moral and spiritual foundation. She discusses the issues many young girls face with gender confusion today and cultural backlash about teaching young girls about God.

Receive the book "Why Curse the Darkness When You Can Light a Candle?" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-07-25?refcd=1446401&treatment=one-time-gift

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/a-safe-place-for-girls-to-grow-up-as-women/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
